#summary How to rebuild nginx and/or add new modules on www instance

= Introduction =

www is running nginx instaeed from a .deb package.
You will need to use a source APT package.

= Details =


{{{
apt-get source nginx

apt-get install build-essential autotools-dev

cd nginx-0.5.33/

vim debian/rules
}}}

find './configure' rules and add --add-module=<path to module sources> at the end.

{{{
dpkg-buildpackage
}}}
